message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-value item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but the price is a little high for me right now. Would you consider a lower price of $8,500?

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $8,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
Hello Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. However, $9,500 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be open to considering $9,000?

I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to go down to $9,000. I can offer you a slight concession, but I need to make sure I'm still making a fair profit. I can offer the product to you for $9,250. This is my final offer on this price point.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. I'm willing to stretch my budget a little further to reach an agreement. Would you consider $9,100 for the product? This is the highest I can go.

I appreciate your willingness to stretch your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not quite there. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I can offer the product to you for $9,300. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the value the product will bring to your business.
